verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye this, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, which are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and are come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, but not in <S%H571>truth<s%>, nor in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

For they <S%H7121>call<s%> themselves of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5564>stay<s%> themselves upon the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>.

I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> from the <S%H227>beginning<s%>; and they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and I <S%H8085>shewed<s%> them; I <S%H6213>did<s%> them <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>, and they came to <S%H935>pass<s%>.
Because I <S%H1847>knew<s%> that thou art <S%H7186>obstinate<s%>, and thy <S%H6203>neck<s%> is an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H1517>sinew<s%>, and thy <S%H4696>brow<s%> <S%H5154>brass<s%>;

I have even from the <S%H227>beginning<s%> <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to thee; before it came to <S%H935>pass<s%> I <S%H8085>shewed<s%> it thee: lest thou shouldest <S%H559>say<s%>, Mine <S%H6090>idol<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> them, and my graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, and my molten <S%H5262>image<s%>, hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them.

Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%>, <S%H2372>see<s%> all this; and will not ye <S%H5046>declare<s%> it? I have <S%H8085>shewed<s%> thee new <S%H2319>things<s%> from this <S%H6258>time<s%>, even hidden <S%H5341>things<s%>, and thou didst not <S%H3045>know<s%> them.

They are <S%H1254>created<s%> now, and not from the beginning; even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> them not; lest thou shouldest <S%H559>say<s%>, Behold, I <S%H3045>knew<s%> them.

Yea, thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> not; yea, thou <S%H3045>knewest<s%> not; yea, from that time that thine <S%H241>ear<s%> was not <S%H6605>opened<s%>: for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that thou wouldest deal <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%>, and wast <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H6586>transgressor<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%>.
¶ For my <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake will I <S%H748>defer<s%> mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and for my <S%H8416>praise<s%> will I <S%H2413>refrain<s%> for thee, that I cut thee not <S%H3772>off<s%>.
Behold, I have <S%H6884>refined<s%> thee, but not with <S%H3701>silver<s%>; I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee in the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
For mine own sake, even for mine own sake, will I <S%H6213>do<s%> it: for how should my name be <S%H2490>polluted<s%>? and I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> unto <S%H312>another<s%>.
¶ <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> unto me, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, my <S%H7121>called<s%>; I am he; I am the <S%H7223>first<s%>, I also am the <S%H314>last<s%>.

Mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> also hath laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> hath <S%H2946>spanned<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: when I <S%H7121>call<s%> unto them, they stand <S%H5975>up<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

All ye, <S%H6908>assemble<s%> yourselves, and <S%H8085>hear<s%>; which among them hath <S%H5046>declared<s%> these things? The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H157>loved<s%> him: he will <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> on <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be on the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.
I, even I, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; yea, I have <S%H7121>called<s%> him: I have <S%H935>brought<s%> him, and he shall make his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous<s%>.

¶ <S%H7126>Come<s%> ye <S%H7126>near<s%> unto me, <S%H8085>hear<s%> ye this; I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>; from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that it was, there am I: and now the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, and his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>, hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> thee to <S%H3276>profit<s%>, which <S%H1869>leadeth<s%> thee by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that thou shouldest <S%H3212>go<s%>.

O <S%H3863>that<s%> thou hadst <S%H7181>hearkened<s%> to my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>! then had thy <S%H7965>peace<s%> been as a <S%H5104>river<s%>, and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H1530>waves<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:

Thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> also had been as the <S%H2344>sand<s%>, and the <S%H6631>offspring<s%> of thy <S%H4578>bowels<s%> like the <S%H4579>gravel<s%> thereof; his <S%H8034>name<s%> should not have been cut <S%H3772>off<s%> nor <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

¶ Go ye <S%H3318>forth<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H1272>flee<s%> ye from the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>singing<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> ye, <S%H8085>tell<s%> this, <S%H3318>utter<s%> it even to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; <S%H559>say<s%> ye, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And they <S%H6770>thirsted<s%> not when he <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H2723>deserts<s%>: he caused the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5140>flow<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for them: he <S%H1234>clave<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> also, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out<s%>.
There is no <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
